snippet: At Almond, the restaurant takes its inspiration from its guests and names its dishes for the purveyors who supply the ingredients....
abstract: Neighborhood Joint column on Almond, friendly, 15-year-old Bridgehampton bistro specializing in farm-to-table entrees named after wife of owner Eric Lemonides, artist Almond Zigmund.
lead_paragraph: At Almond, the restaurant takes its inspiration from its guests and names its dishes for the purveyors who supply the ingredients.

headline.print_headline: A Taste of Paris, via Sagaponack
headline.main: A Taste of Paris in the Hamptons
